Title: Thailand’s PTT seeks more January-February LNG cargoes
Description: Thailand’s state-owned PTT has issued a tender to buy four more LNG cargoes for delivery across January and February to its 11.5 mtpa Map ta Phut LNG receiving terminal in Rayong province. The tender closes on Jan. 14.
Author: CK

Title: Chevron to shut Gorgon Train 2 for maintenance and piping repairs
Description: Chevron will take offline the second train of its 15.6 mtpa Gorgon LNG plant on Barrow Island, Western Australia this week to conduct maintenance and undertake piping repairs.
Author: CK
